sentences.en: A jester at the court of his master, indulged and disesteemed, winning a clement master's praise.
sentences.cn: 左不过是主人宫廷里的一名弄臣, 既被纵容又受到轻视, 博得宽厚的主人一声赞许而已.

sentences.en: How ill white hairs become a fool and jester!
sentences.cn: 白发多麽配不上傻瓜和小丑!

sentences.en: If you want to do flying 200's on the track, that's what the Jester is for.
sentences.cn: 如果你不想做,飞行200的上轨道, 这正是卡拉科夫的目的.

sentences.en: Jester - Right now he just offers cheats.
sentences.cn: 杰斯特 - 现在,他只是提供作弊.

sentences.en: Jester : Don't act so rashly, my boy.
sentences.cn: 杰斯特: 别那么不耐烦, 小伙子.

sentences.en: Jester: He's headed to the control room in the basement.
sentences.cn: 杰斯特: 他 已经 前往地下的控制室了.

sentences.en: Jester: It was quite a ride you know!
sentences.cn: 杰斯特: 你知道这事情真的很难搞!

sentences.en: Jester: It's time for your spanking, my dear!
sentences.cn: 杰斯特: 该打你屁股了, 亲爱的!

sentences.en: Jester: You're not gonna shoot me, are you? If you do, I'll die, you know.
sentences.cn: 杰斯特: 你不会想要射死我, 对 吧 ?如果你那么干了, 我会死的, 你知道.

sentences.en: My name is Jester know a thing or two about this place.
sentences.cn: 我的名字是杰斯特,关于这座建筑略知一二.

sentences.en: My name is Jester, and I know a thing or two about this place.
sentences.cn: 我的名字叫Jester, 而且我知道一些关于这个塔的事情.

sentences.en: Observing the prince take delight in Benedick's conversation, she called him " the prince's jester ".
sentences.cn: 她注意到亲王很喜欢听培尼狄克的谈话, 就叫他作 “ 亲王的小丑. ”

sentences.en: Queen + Duke + Jester: Oh, oh, finally. Our King is out the bathtub.
sentences.cn: 皇后+公爵+弄臣: 喔, 喔, 国王终于出来了!

sentences.en: Robin Hood: I know, he'll make me court jester.
sentences.cn: 罗宾汉: 我知道, 他会让我成为宫廷弄臣.
丑角挥动手中拿着的木棒.

words.tran_cn: 爱开玩笑的；打趣的；滑稽的
（中世纪宫廷或贵族家中的）小丑；爱开玩笑的人

trans.tran_cn: （昔日为统治者说笑逗乐的）弄臣
trans.tran_en: a man employed in the past by a ruler to entertain people with jokes, stories etc
